definition: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)

sentences.english: Inhalable particulate matters(IP)bring adverse influence on ambient air and human health.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物嚴重影響空氣質量和人體健康。

sentences.english: Ahvaz's annual average of PM10s was 372 micrograms per cubic meter.
sentences.chinese: 阿瓦士年均可吸入顆粒物含量爲每立方米372微克。

sentences.english: Respirable particles from the most serious of which has become larger primary pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 其中可吸入顆粒物最嚴重，已成爲居室首要污染物。

sentences.english: Oil soluble detergent are used in gasoline and lubricating oils to hold particulate impurities in suspension.
sentences.chinese: 油溶性洗滌劑用於汽油和潤滑油可使顆粒物雜質懸浮。

sentences.english: The inhalable particles concentration level is an important inference factor for indoor air quality(IAQ).
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物濃度是影響室內空氣品質的重要因素。

sentences.english: Other pollutants, especially particulates, were also present.
sentences.chinese: 也有其他污染物存在，特別是顆粒物。

sentences.english: PM affects more people than any other pollutant.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物對人的影響要大於其他任何污染物。

sentences.english: We will start the work of denitration in coal-fired power plants and strengthen prevention and control of particles pollution;
sentences.chinese: 啓動燃煤電廠脫硝工作，深化顆粒物污染防治。

sentences.english: Particulate matter can 'influence reproductive abilities, ' it says.
sentences.chinese: 報告說，顆粒物可能影響生殖能力。

sentences.english: Second Movement from pollution caused by respirable particles.
sentences.chinese: 運動造成的可吸入顆粒物污染。

sentences.english: The results show that the concentration of phthalate esters in algae and particles in higher than those in water.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，大多數的污染物存在於藻體和顆粒物上。

sentences.english: The larger the roughness of leaf surface, the larger density of the particles was.
sentences.chinese: 葉表面粗糙程度越大，顆粒物附着密度越高。

sentences.english: The city currently releases measurements only for coarser PM10 particles.
sentences.chinese: 北京市目前只公佈針對更大顆粒物的PM10。
